forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 34, with temperatures rising to around 36 overnight. Wind chill values as low as 25. South southeast wind 16 to 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Rain And Snow Showers Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before noon, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 41, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. Wind chill values as low as 25. Southeast wind 7 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
